***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Etymology[edit] ****
Likely from a combination of Classical_Newar 𑐳𑑃𑐖 (sãja) + देय् (deê), from
Classical_Newar 𑐡𑐾𑐱 (deśa), from Sanskrit देश (deśa).
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [sə̃ːdeɛː]
**** Proper noun[edit] ****
संदेय् • (saṃdeê) ? (Newa Spelling 𑐳𑑄𑐡𑐾𑐫𑑂)
   1. Tibet
*** Alternative forms[edit] ***
    * सँदेय्‌ (sãdeê)
